pinyin: er4 shi2 yi1 san1 ti3 zong1 he2 zheng4

sentences.english: Derivation of a formula for determination of proportion of paternal trisomy 21 is presented.
sentences.chinese: 推導公式確定比例的父親是21三體。

sentences.english: Every character has to resolve three-body control.
sentences.chinese: 每字都有三體對照解析。

sentences.english: Primary trisomic in barley played the important role in genetic and breeding.
sentences.chinese: 大麥的初級三體在遺傳育種上有重要價值。

sentences.english: In a three-body decay, the emerging particles have more freedom.
sentences.chinese: 在三體衰變中，出現的產物粒子有較大的自由度。

sentences.english: This thesis provides a reference for the trimaran structural design in the future.
sentences.chinese: 爲今後三體船在結構設計方面提供了參考。

sentences.english: Her win comes a year after Liu Cixin won a Hugo for his novel The Three-Body Problem.
sentences.chinese: 就在一年前，劉慈欣的作品《三體》獲得了雨果獎。

sentences.english: The calculating by this formula has the same tendency as that obtained from three-body wear experiments.
sentences.chinese: 用此公式計算所得的磨損量基本能反映三體磨損趨勢。

sentences.english: In fact the comprehensive research of trimaran is just at the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 但是，關於三體船的深入研究還剛剛起步。

definition: name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
imperial edict/heavenly book (superstition)/obscure or illegible writing/double dutch
to abridge/to cut a text down to size for publication

A Mirror for the Wise Ruler (or Comprehensive Mirror for Aid in Government), a vast chronological general history, written by 司馬光|司马光[Si1 ma3 Guang1] Sima Guang (1019-1089) and collaborators during the Northern Song in 1084, covering the period 403 BC-959 AD, 294 scrolls
entire book/unabridged book/entire multi-volume work/comprehensive volume
Three Hundred Tang Poems, an anthology collected around 1763 by Sun Zhu 孫誅
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
